Text: ENJOY ENJOY ENJOY ENJOY Skyfall 2012 DVDRIP New Movie by SPARKS!
i just hate it when they do 2 cd's is all!!!!!

Yes I agree, 2 CD is really stupid. And totally useless. Seriously, unless you live in some third world country and can only download 700MB movies, who still uses CD for his movies nowadays??? Plus the one who ripped this was forced to use a really low video bitrate, 900 kbps, just so he could put the movies on CD!! Incredibly stupid once again. We're in 2013, CD and 700MB movies are completely outdated.
Not really a problem though, the blu-ray will be available very soon.
I agree its a pain but if you convert it you can put it on one dvd and it plays ok  but there is a pause as you select each cd.  The price we have to pay I suppose,  still, great effort thanks.......
